name: Necromancy Overload
description:
KNOWN ISSUE: When trying to play the game after returning to the menu or restarting from the pause screen, the game will crash. You'll just have to relaunch the game and hopefully I'll get a patch for that soon.

You are a necromancer attempting to perform the ritual of the damned at the royal graveyard. Heroes have arrived to stop you, so hold out as long as you can! Your power has become so great that if you destroy a weakened enemy with a powerful spell, the excess damage will cause an explosion! Use these to your advantage and destroy the incoming hordes!

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar (+WASD) - Teleport
  • Left click - Shoot
  • Q/E - Change weapons
  • Escape - Pause
